option.name: images
option._long: The files to use as background images, repetition will occur if you have fewer than hsize*vsize images. Note using fewer images will conserve video memory Format is as follows: for loading a file file:pathToFile:opacity; where opacity is in the 0 to 1 range. For a solid fill you can use fill:r,g,b:opacity; where r g b and opacity are in the 0 to 1 range. linear:x1,y1,x2,y2|r1,g1,b1,r2,g2,b2:opacity; creates a linear gradient from x1,y1 to x2,y2 blending between (r1,g1,b1) and (r2,g2,b2), all values are in the 0.0-1.0 range.
